## Redesigning a misleading political graph

###Requirements  
 - 100 Observations of votes (20 req.)
 - 1 quantitative variable: donation amount (1 req.)

###Report

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=F, warning=F}
library("knitr")
include_graphics("../resources/d5-telecomSenate-original.png")
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=F, warning=F}
library("knitr")
include_graphics("../figures/d5-telecomSenate.png")
```
